verses.verse: <S%G2258><s%> Now There Were <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Which Was There <S%G5607><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teachers, <S%G1320><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Simeon <S%G4826><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Called <S%G2564><s%> Niger, <S%G3526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lucius <S%G3066><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cyrenian, <S%G2956><s%> And Manaen, <S%G3127><s%> Of <S%G5037><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> A Foster Brother <S%G4939><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saul. <S%G4569><s%>

As Were Ministering <S%G3008><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fasting, <S%G3522><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Separate <S%G873><s%> Indeed <S%G1211><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> To Which <S%G3739><s%> I Have Called <S%G4341><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Fasted <S%G3522><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prayed, <S%G4336><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Laid <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> On Them, <S%G846><s%> They Let Them Go. <S%G630><s%>

They <S%G3778><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Having Been Sent Forth <S%G1599><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Went Down <S%G2718><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Seleucia, <S%G4581><s%> <S%G1564><s%> And Thence <S%G5037><s%> Sailed Away <S%G636><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cyprus. <S%G2954><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G1096><s%> Into <S%G1722><s%> Salamis <S%G4529><s%> They Announced <S%G2605><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogues <S%G4864><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%> And They <S%G2192><s%> Had <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> John As <S%G2491><s%> An Attendant <S%G5257><s%>

<S%G1330><s%> And Having Passed Through <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Island <S%G3520><s%> As Far As <S%G891><s%> Paphos <S%G3974><s%> They Found <S%G2147><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Magician, <S%G3097><s%> A False Prophet <S%G5578><s%> A Jew, <S%G2453><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> Name Was <S%G3686><s%> , Bar - Jesus, <S%G919><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proconsul <S%G446><s%> Sergius <S%G4588><s%> Paulus, <S%G3972><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> An Intelligent. <S%G4908><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> Desired <S%G1934><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G436><s%> But There Withstood <S%G1161><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Elymas <S%G1681><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magician, <S%G3097><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Is Interpreted <S%G3177><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> To Pervert <S%G1294><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proconsul <S%G446><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G4569><s%> But Saul, <S%G1161><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Is Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Being Filled <S%G4130><s%> With The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Steadfastly <S%G816><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%>

Said, <S%G2036><s%> O 5599 INJ Full 4134 A-NSM Of All 3956 A-GSM Guile 1388 N-GSM And 2532 CONJ All 3956 A-GSF Craft, 4468 N-GSF Son 5207 N-VSM Of The Devil, 1228 A-GSM Enemy 2190 A-VSM Of All 3956 A-GSF Righteousness, 1343 N-GSF Wilt Thou 3756 PRT-N Not Cease 3973 V-FDI-2S Perverting 1294 V-PAP-NSM The 3588 T-APF Ways 3598 N-APF Of The Lord 2962 N-GSM S 3588 T-APF Straight? 2117 A-APF

And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Is Upon <S%G1909><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Be <S%G2071><s%> Blind, <S%G5185><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> For <S%G891><s%> A Season. <S%G2540><s%> <S%G3916><s%> And Immediately <S%G1161><s%> Fell <S%G1968><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Mist <S%G887><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Darkness, <S%G4655><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Going About <S%G4013><s%> He Sought Some <S%G2212><s%> To Lead Him By The Hand. <S%G5497><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proconsul <S%G446><s%> What <S%G3588><s%> Had Happened <S%G1096><s%> Believed, <S%G4100><s%> Being Astonished <S%G1605><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G321><s%> And Having Sailed <S%G1161><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paphos With <S%G3974><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> About Him <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Perga <S%G4011><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Pamphylia; <S%G3828><s%> <S%G2491><s%> And John <S%G1161><s%> Having Departed <S%G672><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

They <S%G846><s%> But, <S%G1161><s%> Having Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Perga, <S%G4011><s%> Came <S%G3854><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Pisidia, <S%G4099><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> They Sat Down. <S%G2523><s%>

<S%G3326><s%> And After <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reading <S%G320><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rulers Of The Synagogue <S%G752><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> A Word <S%G3056><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Of Exhortation <S%G3874><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> Speak. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Having Risen Up <S%G1161><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Making A Sign <S%G2678><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Hand, <S%G5495><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Israelites, <S%G2475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Fearing <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Hearken. <S%G191><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> Chose <S%G1586><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Exulted <S%G5312><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sojourning <S%G3940><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> , Of Egypt, <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Arm <S%G1023><s%> A High <S%G5308><s%> Brought <S%G1806><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> It, <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Forty Years <S%G5063><s%> The Time <S%G5550><s%> He Bore Manners <S%G5159><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desert. <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Destroyed <S%G2507><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Canaan, <S%G5477><s%> He Gave By Lot <S%G2624><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Land. <S%G1093><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Four Hundred <S%G5071><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fifty <S%G4004><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> Judges <S%G2923><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Samuel <S%G4545><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

And Then <S%G2547><s%> They Asked For <S%G154><s%> A King, <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Saul <S%G4549><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Kish, <S%G2797><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Benjamin, <S%G958><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Forty. <S%G5062><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Removed <S%G3179><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> King, <S%G935><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> Having Born Witness, <S%G3140><s%> I Found <S%G2147><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesse, <S%G2421><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Will Do <S%G4160><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Will. <S%G2307><s%> My <S%G3450><s%>

Of This Man <S%G5127><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> ' According To <S%G2596><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Israel <S%G2474><s%> A Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

Having Before Proclaimed <S%G4296><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Before The <S%G4253><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1529><s%> Of His Entrance <S%G846><s%> A Baptism <S%G908><s%> Of Repentance <S%G3341><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Men <S%G435><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The Race <S%G1085><s%> Of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Fearing <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of This <S%G4991><s%> Salvation <S%G3778><s%> Was Sent : <S%G649><s%>

Those <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Dwelling <S%G2730><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Rulers, <S%G758><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G5126><s%> Having Known <S%G50><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voices <S%G5456><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G2596><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> Are Read <S%G314><s%> Having Judged <S%G2919><s%> Him They Fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Cause <S%G156><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> They Begged <S%G154><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> To Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> They Finished <S%G5055><s%> All Things <S%G537><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Had Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> Having Taken Him Down <S%G2507><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree, <S%G3586><s%> They Put Him <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> A Tomb; <S%G3419><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Raised <S%G1453><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Appeared <S%G3700><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Many <S%G4119><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Came Up With <S%G4872><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Witnesses <S%G3144><s%> His <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> To You <S%G5209><s%> Announce The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Made, <S%G1096><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Fulfilled <S%G1603><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> Having Raised Up <S%G450><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Psalm <S%G5568><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Thou <S%G1488><s%> Art, <S%G4771><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Today 4594 ADV Have Begotten 1080 V-RAI-1S Thee. 4571 P-2AS

And <S%G3754><s%> That <S%G1161><s%> He Raised <S%G450><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> No More <S%G3371><s%> To Be About <S%G3195><s%> To Return <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Corruption, <S%G1312><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> <S%G2046><s%> He Spoke : <S%G3754><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mercies <S%G3741><s%> Of David <S%G1138><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> Thou <S%G3756><s%> Wilt Not Suffer <S%G1325><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G3741><s%> One <S%G4675><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Corruption. <S%G1312><s%>

David <S%G1138><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To His Own <S%G2398><s%> Generation <S%G1074><s%> Having Ministered <S%G5256><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Counsel <S%G1012><s%> Fell Asleep, <S%G2837><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Added <S%G4369><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Corruption. <S%G1312><s%>
